txt.en: Help dwarves of the Gabil'akkâ overcome thoughts of despair ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Helped dwarves of the Gabil'akkâ overcome thoughts of despair ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
'Thank you, [placeholder]! We are not beaten yet!'
Thoughts of despair have very nearly overwhelmed this dwarf!
Your mission is to raise the spirits of disheartened soldiers of the Gabil'akkâ at Zarkul-sulûn and help them to overcome thoughts of despair.

As the War of Three Peaks drew near its end, the Dwarves of the Gabil'akkâ suffered a sudden, terrible setback. Before the final effort is made to breach the gates of Gundabad, the dwarves must resist falling to despair and overcome their doubts.
